text: Had pleasant visits to FERC for a couple of times now. A church that holds to faithful confessions - mainly, the Three Forms of Unity and also, to an extent, the Westminster Confession of Faith while having sound and faithful preaching of the Word. The people here are welcoming and down-to-earth toward guests. Will definitely visit a couple more times for as long as I am in Singapore.

A pleasure to worship with this warm and friendly Reformed congregation. Services are conducted in a reverent manner, and preaching from the Bible exalts the Lord Jesus Christ. Church members pleasant and attentive to guests. A place were Almighty God is honoured. Heartily recommended for a visit.
Safe entry is 100% safe,scan token at entrance also going in class have to scan again,orderly out by group also no mingling outside church
I grew up here. Solid Reformed doctrines, 5-point Calvinism, Heidelberg Cathechism, Canons of Dort, Belgic Confession.
